item.title: /Uses/
item.description: I'm often curious to know what software or tools are others using in their everyday routines ‚Äî so inspired by Awesome-Uses I've created this page to share my setup. Enjoy! ‚úåÔ∏è üíª Hardware MacBook Pro 13inch. Mac Mini with eGPU connected to dual “IPS” monitors (4K & 2K 144Hz). My keyboard is the Ducky Channel One 2 Mini with Cherry MX Red Silent switches. My mouse is the wireless Logitech G903.
